name: Be strong
description:
left mouse - Block
Right mouse - Jump
Long press - Jump Higher

Our protagonist is a little fighter in a red robe, He can use block and jump operations to defend against Boss attacks. When the defense value reaches its peak, he will make a clear blow to defeat the enemy and clear the level.

We have designed 3 levels for the game: 03-S, 08-E and 19-C. Its design inspiration comes from:
In 2003, SARS that is the war without warsmoke
Strong earthquakes that affected the hearts of countless people in 2008
as well as, In 2020, we are going through an ordeal ...

What does not kill me, makes me stronger.
——German philosopher Friedrich Nietzsche (1844 - 1900).Twilight of the Idols

We hope to use this to show the tenacious and persistent spirit of the Chinese people, and in this way pay tribute to the heroes who are struggling at the front line of the epidemic, and cheer for the fellow people who are fighting against the disease.
The above is our original intention to make this game.

正如游戏名所称，「Be Strong」是我们想要传达给玩家的信念。

德国哲学家·尼采曾说过，凡不能打垮我们的，终使我们更加强大。

主人公每抵御一次攻击，就会增强他的能力，直至实现最终的一击必杀。
在现实里，每个人都是主人公，也一定经历了一次又一次的伤痛折磨，咬着牙挺过来。
Be Strong，这次也一样！！

虽然听起来挺简单，不过游戏的操作还是挺硬核的
相信大家玩的时候，也会有更深的感触。
另外特别感谢帮助我们的小伙伴们，
我们也期待玩家的建议与反馈。

特别感谢热心帮助的朋友：
原画&场景：雷 洋（武汉）
音乐&音效：尤裴佳（成都）
动 作：西米羊（成都）
